title: Input schema for Instagram Posts scraper

usernames.title: Instagram username(s)
usernames.description: Provide a profile URL of the account you want to scrape the posts from.

followedByLimit.title: Maximum number of followers
followedByLimit.description: Set the maximum number of followers you want to scrape. The actor usually cannot overcome 10,000 followers limit.

loginCookies.title: Cookies (read the test under '?' to see how and why this is needed)
loginCookies.description: Instagram limits access to certain data (likes, post user data, followers, and other information) if a user is anonymous. You can provide cookies here to log in as a normal Instagram user (you can copy with a Chrome plugin like 'EditThisCookie'). Note that we recommend that you do not use your own Instagram account for this - use a new, temporary Instagram account. When cookies are used, the run is limited to concurrency 1 and one session, so that the account does not get banned too soon.
